bug.author: wutaomsft
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
the command line in README.md (git clone <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/Recommenders>https://github.com/Microsoft/Recommenders</denchmark-link> ) would create Recommenders directory; while following the green "Code" button on github home page would get <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders.git>https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders.git</denchmark-link> which will create recommenders directory. <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
All <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
see above <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Be consistent. Suggest using lower case to be the same as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders.git>https://github.com/microsoft/recommenders.git</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Seems to be more work than a couple of hours (databricks egg file etc).
